channel.title: Presentations on Joo-Von Kim

item.title: Invited talks
item.description:
Invited talks #

  1. Self-induced Floquet magnons in magnetic vortices
    E-MRS Fall Meeting 2025
    Warsaw, Poland; 15 – 18 Sep 2025.
  2. Mode filtering and projection methods for studying magnon population dynamics
    2025 IEEE Advances in Magnetics
    Bressanone, Italy; 9 – 12 Feb 2025.
  3. Annealing a skyrmion lattice with spin wave excitations
    Nanomagnetism in 3D (SPICE Workshop)
    Ingelheim, Germany; 30 Apr – 2 May 2024.
  4. Multimode parametric excitations for nonlinear magnonic computing
    Neuromorphic Magnonics Workshop
    Paris, France; 24 – 26 Apr 2024.
  5. Aspects of Unconventional Computing with Nonlinear Magnonics
    Magnonics 2023
    Le Touquet-Paris-Plage, 30 Jul – 3 Aug 2023.
  6. Resonant skyrmion dynamics and spin wave generation in magnetic multilayers
    International Workshop on Topological Structures in Ferroic Materials
    Mainz, Germany; 13–16 Sep 2022.
  7. Localised modes and spin wave focusing in synthetic antiferromagnets
    12th International Conference on Advanced Materials and Devices (Hybrid)
    Jeju, Republic of Korea (Hybrid); 6–10 Dec 2021.
  8. Localised modes and spin wave focusing in synthetic antiferromagnets
    2020-2021 IEEE Advances in Magnetics
    Moena, Italy (Online); 13-16 Jun 2021.
  9. Nonlinear and stochatic dynamics of skyrmions in frustrated magnets
    Intermag 2021<2020-2021
    Lyon, France (Online); 26-30 Apr 2021.
  10. Skyrmiogenesis: Asymmetry in skyrmion-antiskyrmion pair production
    CMD2020GEFES
    Madrid, Spain (Online); 31 Aug - 4 Sep 2020.
  11. Chaos-based information processing with nanocontact vortex oscillators
    French-US Symposium on Nanoelectronics
    Paris, France; 25-27 Sep 2019.
  12. Spin wave power flow and caustics in thin films with Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interactions
    Magnonics 2019
    Carovigno, Italy; 28 Jul - 1 Aug 2019.
  13. Skyrmion dynamics driven by spin-orbit torques
    IEEE Advances in Magnetics 2018
    La Thuile, Italy; 5-7 Feb 2018.
  14. Nonreciprocal Spin Wave Power Flow and Caustics in Ultrathin Ferromagnets
    62nd Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials
    Pittsburgh, USA; 6-10 Nov 2017.
  15. Domain wall creep and current-driven skyrmion motion
    International Workshop on Topological Structures in Ferroic Materials
    Leeds, UK; 8-10 Aug 2017.
  16. Spin wave caustics and channelling in chiral spin systems
    2017 Spring Meeting – Deutsche Physikalische Gesellschaft
    Dresden, Germany; 19-24 Mar 2017.
  17. Chaotic dynamics in nanocontact vortex oscillators
    Topological Patterns and Dynamics in Magnetic Elements and in Condensed Matter
    Dresden, Germany; 27 Jun - 8 Jul 2016.
  18. Chaos and delayed feedback in nanocontact vortex oscillators
    MOSAIC Workshop
    Varberg, Sweden; 15–18 Jun 2016.
  19. Spin wave channelling in chiral spin textures
    Controlling Magnetic Nanostructures
    Konstanz, Germany; 23–25 Sep 2015.
  20. Spin wave dynamics in ultrathin magnetic films with chiral interactions
    Spin-orbit coupling in surface or interface states
    Spetses, Greece; 8–12 Jun 2015.
  21. Chaotic states in nanoscale magnetic vortex oscillators
    International Workshop on Topological Structures in Ferroic Materials
    Sydney, Australia; 19–22 May 2015.
  22. Nonreciprocal spin wave channeling in chiral spin textures driven by the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction
    JSPS Symposium on Nanoscale Physics of Quantum Materials
    Leeds, UK; 11–12 Aug 2014.
  23. Nonreciprocal spin wave channeling in chiral spin textures driven by the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction
    Spin Torques and Magnetic Solitons Workshop
    Göteborg, Sweden; 6 Jun 2014.
  24. Commensurability and chaos in magnetic vortex oscillations
    2014 Spring Meeting – Deutsche Physikalische Gesellschaft
    Dresden, Germany; 30 Mar – 4 Apr 2014.
  25. Nonreciprocal spin-wave propagation in spin textures driven by the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction
    Current-Driven Magnetisation Dynamics
    Leeds, UK; 7–9 Jan 2014.
  26. Commensurability and chaos in magnetic vortex oscillations
    8th International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers
    Kyoto, Japan; 19–24 May 2013.
  27. Commensurability and chaos in magnetic vortex oscillations
    Spin Dynamics in Nanomagnets
    Seoul, Republic of Korea; 15-18 Jul 2012.
  28. Commensurability and chaos in magnetic vortex oscillations
    Spin Master Voice 2010
    Villiers-le-Mahieu, France; 14-16 Dec 2011.
  29. Vortex Oscillations in Magnetic Nanocontacts
    Eastmag Conference
    Ekaterinburg, Russian Federation; 28 June – 2 Jul 2010.
  30. Current-driven vortex dynamics in metallic nanocontacts
    SPIE Optics+Photonics
    San Diego, USA; 2-6 Aug 2009.
  31. Current-driven vortex oscillations in metallic point-contact systems
    2nd WUN International Conference on Spintronic Materials and Technology
    Nanjing, China; 13–16 Jul 2008.
  32. Spin-transfer oscillators
    DeGennesDays 2008
    Paris, France; 14-17 May 2008.
  33. Current-driven vortex oscillations in metallic point-contacts
    Intermag Conference 2008
    Madrid, Spain; 4-8 May 2008.
  34. Current-driven spin-wave eigenmodes in rectangular spin-valve nanopillars
    6th IEEE International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers
    Perth, Australia; 15–19 Oct 2007.
  35. Magnetic random access memories: Reliability and future challenges
    Eurenet Conference
    Paris, France; 6 Mar 2007.
  36. La dynamique rapide des nanoaimants
    Séminaire Daniel Dautreppe
    Grenoble, France; 25-29 Sep 2006.
  37. Current-driven magnetisation dynamics in spin-valve nanopillars
    Spintronex 06
    Paris, France; 5 Apr 2006.
  38. Une nouvelle dynamique rapide des nano-aimants : la relaxation et le transfert de spin
    14th Colloque Bouyssy
    Orsay, France; 23-24 Feb 2006.
  39. Current-driven magnetization dynamics in spin-valve nanopillars
    1st Symposium on Nanoscience and Nanotechnology between Sanken and CNRS
    Orsay, France; 12-13 Feb 2006.
  40. Metallic spin transport on the nanoscale: From giant magnetoresistance to spin-momentum transfer
    Physics for Large and Small Scales
    Hanoi, Vietnam; 8-9 Jan 2006.

item.title: Regular contributions
item.description:
Regular contributions #

  1. Micromagnetics study of magnon Floquet states in magnetic vortices (oral)
    14th International Symposium on Hysteresis Modeling and Micromagnetics, Turin, Italy; 26 - 28 May 2025.
  2. Mode filtering and projection methods for studying magnon population dynamics (oral)
    Micromagnetics for Magnonics Workshop, Kaiserslautern, Germany; 8 Oct 2024.
  3. Pattern recognition in reciprocal space with a magnon-scattering reservoir (poster)
    21ème Colloque Louis Néel, Sète, France; 13 – 16 Nov 2023.
  4. Pattern recognition in a magnon-scattering reservoir (oral)
    9eme Journées Complexité Désordre, Paris, France; 19-20 Jun 2023.
  5. Resonant dynamics of three-dimensional skyrmionic textures in thin film multilayers (oral)
    Hysteresis Modeling and Micromagnetics 2023, Vienna, Austria; 5-7 Jun 2023.
  6. Mode-resolved micromagnetics simulations for nonlinear spin wave processes in confined systems (poster)
    Hysteresis Modeling and Micromagnetics 2023, Vienna, Austria; 5-7 Jun 2023.
  7. Annealing a skyrmion lattice with spin wave excitations
    67th Annual Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Minneapolis, USA (hybrid); 31 Oct – 4 Nov 2022.
  8. Anomalous thermal drift of skyrmions in frustrated magnets under spin-orbit torques
    15th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, New Orleans, USA (Hybrid); 10-14 Jan 2022.
  9. On quantifying the topological charge in micromagnetics using a lattice-based approach
    Intermag 2021, Lyon, France (Virtual); 26-30 Apr 2021.
  10. Simulating Spin Wave Noise in Synthetic Antiferromagnetic Textures
    65th Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials (Virtual); 2-6 Nov 2020.
  11. Skyrmiogenesis: Skyrmion-antiskyrmion asymmetry from pair generation (oral)
    64th Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Las Vegas (NV), USA; 4-8 Nov 2019.
  12. Nonlinear dynamics of spin-torque nano-oscillators with delayed feedback (oral)
    64th Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Las Vegas (NV), USA; 4-8 Nov 2019.
  13. Skyrmiogenesis: Skyrmion-antiskyrmion asymmetry from pair generation (oral)
    10th International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers (MML), Madrid, Spain; 17-21 Jun 2019.
  14. Trochoidal motion and pair generation in skyrmion and antiskyrmion dynamics driven by spin-orbit torques (poster)
    19th Colloque Louis Néel, Toulouse, France; 14-17 May 2019.
  15. Trochoidal motion and pair generation in skyrmion and antiskyrmion dynamics driven by spin-orbit torques (oral)
    23rd International Colloquium on Magnetic Films and Surfaces, Santa Cruz CA, USA; 22-27 Jul 2018.
  16. Skyrmion and antiskyrmion dynamics in ultrathin ferromagnetic films driven by spin-orbit torques (oral)
    2018 Intermag Conference, Singapore; 23-27 Apr 2018.
  17. Current-driven skyrmion dynamics in disordered ultrathin films (oral)
    62nd Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Pittsburgh, USA; 6-10 Nov 2017.
  18. Current-driven skyrmion dynamics in disordered ultrathin films (poster)
    2017 SKYMAG Workshop, Paris, France; 2-5 May 2017.
  19. Current-driven skyrmion dynamics in disordered ultrathin films (poster)
    2017 Intermag Conference, Dublin, Ireland; 24-28 Apr 2017.
  20. Spin wave power flow and caustics in ultrathin films with the Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction and spin currents (oral)
    2017 Intermag Conference, Dublin, Ireland; 24-28 Apr 2017.
  21. Measurement of the exchange stiffness in ultrathin perpendicularly magnetized CoFeB layers (oral)
    13th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, San Diego, USA; 11-15 Jan 2016.
  22. Skyrmion oscillators with inhomogeneous polarizers (oral)
    13th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, San Diego, USA; 11-15 Jan 2016.
  23. Spin wave power flow in chiral magnetic systems (oral)
    13th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, San Diego, USA; 11-15 Jan 2016.
  24. Spin waves in films, dots, and domain walls with Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interactions (oral)
    58th Magnetism and Magnetic Materials Conference, Denver, USA; 4-8 Nov 2013.
  25. Commensurate and incommensurate states in nanocontact vortex oscillations (oral)
    12th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, Chicago, USA; 14-18 Jan 2013.
  26. ns-scale magnetization reversal in (Ga,Mn)As using electrical field gating (oral)
    56th Conference on Magnetism and Magnetic Materials, Scottsdale, Arizona, USA; 30 Oct – 3 Nov 2011.
  27. Phase locking of gyrotropic oscillations and periodic core reversal in nanocontact vortex oscillators (oral)
    56th Magnetism and Magnetic Materials Conference, Scottsdate, Arizona, USA; 30 Oct – 3 Nov 2011.
  28. Time-resolved measurements of vortex core reversal in vortex magnetic nanocontact oscillations (oral)
    55th Magnetism and Magnetic Materials Conference, Atlanta, USA; 14-18 Nov 2010.
  29. Spin-wave contributions to current-driven domain wall motion (oral)
    11th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, Washington, DC, USA; 14-18 Jan 2010.
  30. Theory of the power spectrum of current-driven vortex oscillations in magnetic nanocontacts (oral)
    11th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, Washington, DC, USA; 14-18 Jan 2010.
  31. Spin-wave contributions to current-driven domain wall motion (poster)
    20th International Colloquium on Magnetic Films and Surfaces, Berlin, Germany; 20-24 Jul 2009
  32. Fokker-Plank theory of stochastic dynamics of spin-torque auto-oscillators (oral)
    53rd Magnetism and Magnetic Materials Conference, Austin, Texas, USA ; 10-14 Nov 2008.
  33. Asymmetric lineshapes in spin-torque nano-oscillators near threshold (oral)
    2008 Intermag Conference, Madrid, Spain; 4-8 May 2008.
  34. Stochastic theory of spin-torque oscillator linewidths (poster)
    11e Colloque Louis Néel, Lyon, France; 14-16 Mar 2007.
  35. Mode-hopping of current-driven excitations in spin-valve point-contacts (poster)
    10th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, Baltimore, USA; 7-11 Jan 2007.
  36. Stochastic theory of spin-transfer oscillator linewidths (oral)
    10th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, Baltimore, USA; 7-11 Jan 2007.
  37. Stochastic theory of spin-torque oscillator linewidths (poster)
    International Workshop on Spin Transfer, Nancy, France; 2-4 Oct 2006.
  38. Narrow spectral lines in spin-transfer oscillators based on spin-valve nanopillars: Theory and Experiment (poster)
    French-US Workshop on Spintronics and Magnetic Nanostructures, Saint Pierre de Chartreuse, France; 12-14 Juin 2006.
  39. Commutation d’un antiferromagnétique synthétique dans le régime précessionel (oral)
    10e Colloque Louis Néel, Dourdan, France; 21-23 Sep 2005.
  40. Hysteresis from antiferromagnetic domain wall processes in exchange-bias systems (poster)
    5th International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers, Boulder, USA; 7-11 Jun 2004.
  41. Magnetization dynamics of spin-valves with spin-pumping (oral)
    5th International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers, Boulder, USA; 7-11 Jun 2004.
  42. Dynamique de l’aimantation en présence du transfert de spin (poster)
    9e Colloque Louis Néel, Autrans, France ; 17-19 Mar 2004.
  43. Probing magnetic order with heat capacity in exchange-biased structures (poster)
    4th International Symposium on Metallic Multilayers, Aachen, Germany ; 24-29 Jun 2001.
  44. Calculations of long-wavelength spin-waves in exchange-biased bilayers (poster)
    8th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, San Antonio, USA ; 7-11 Jan 2001.
  45. The role of atomic defects in exchange-biased ferromagnetic/antiferromagnetic bilayers (poster)
    8th Joint MMM-Intermag Conference, San Antonio, USA ; 7-11 Jan 2001.
  46. Exchange bias: interface imperfections and temperature dependence (poster)
    Joint Magnetics Workshop (UK), York, UK; 5-7 Jul 1999.

item.title: Seminars
item.description:
Seminars #

  1. Aspects of unconventional computing with nonlinear magnonics
    Paul Scherrer Institut
    Villigen, Switzerland; 18 March 2024.
  2. Resonant dynamics and anomalous thermal diffusion of magnetic skyrmions
    Spin+X Distinguished Lecture
    Institut für Physik, Johannes Gutenberg-Universität Mainz
    Mainz, Germany; 30 January 2023.
  3. Chaos-based information processing with nano contact vortex oscillators
    PETASPIN Seminar (online)
    4 Feb 2021.
  4. Magnetization dynamics in chiral spin textures
    C2N General Seminar (online)
    27 November 2020.
  5. Magnetization dynamics in chiral spin textures
    CEA – Service de Physique de l'Etat Condensé
    Gif-sur-Yvette, France; 27 November 2019.
  6. Skyrmions and antiskyrmions under spin-orbit torques: Effects of disorder, trochoidal motion, and skyrmiogenesis
    SPINTEC
    Grenoble, France; 30 January 2019.
  7. Magnetic skyrmions: Nanoscale chiral particles for future information technologies?
    Akademickie Centrum Materiałów i Nanotechnologii
    Krakow, Poland; 19 December 2018.
  8. Magnetic skyrmions: Nanoscale chiral particles for future information technologies?
    Department of Physics, University of Western Australia
    Perth, Australia; 28 November 2018.

  10. Magnetization dynamics in chiral spin textures

    Mainz, Germany; 21 July 2015.
  17. Nanoscale magnetic vortex oscillators
    School of Physics, University of Western Australia
     Perth, Australia; 13 May 2015.
  18. Commensurate and chaotic phases in magnetic vortex oscillations

    New York, USA; 28 Apr 2014.
  19. Spin-torque oscillators

    New York, USA; 25 Jan 2010.

     Perth, Australia; 23 Oct 2007.

     Grenoble, France; 22 Jun 2007.
  24. Stochastic theory of spin-transfer oscillators

  25. Precessional dynamics of coupled bilayer magnetic thin films
    Laboratoire de Magnétisme et d’Optique de Versailles
